name: Destiny Dungeon (in development)
description:
Destiny Dungeon is a roguelike cardgame rpg inspired by Slay the Spire and D&D.

In this game you get cards by equipping items and each one has an specific card with it. You also can get bonus stats by equipping items that correlate with each other, such as 2 of the same weapon, a full set of given armor or even 3 different rings. 
All of these bonus are hidden so you will need to play a couple times to discover every combination possible.
